Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.string

Class AsciiArt

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.string.AsciiArt
public class AsciiArt extends Object
Provides methods to create "ASCII art", including:
  • Banners
  • Lines
  • Boxes
  • Bulleted lists
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
